subject: Assaults
lead_paragraph: Chad Speck, an agent for the suspended Redskins defensive lineman Albert Haynesworth, said that Haynesworth was innocent of accusations that he assaulted a driver during a road-rage incident.
snippet: Chad Speck, an agent for the suspended Redskins defensive lineman Albert Haynesworth, said that Haynesworth was innocent of accusations that he assaulted a driver during a road-rage incident.
